sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input
    type="text"
    :value="name"
    @input="updateName"
  />
  <button
    class="btn btn-primary"
    @click="onSubmit"
  >
    Click
  </button>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from 'vue';

export default {
  setup() {
    const name = ref('dodomi');
    const type = ref('number');
    const nameClass = ref('');

    // const greeting = (name) => {
    //   return 'Hello, ' + name;
    // };

    // const greet = greeting(name);

    const onSubmit = () => {
      console.log(name.value);
    };

    const updateName = () => {
      name.value = (e) => {
        name.value = e.target.value;
      };
    };

    return {
      name,
      updateName,
      type,
      nameClass,
      onSubmit,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.name {
  color: teal;
}
</style>
